i1.name: Crystal Spires
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Skarner's''' presence causes 6 ''Crystal Spires'' to appear at set points on the [[Summoner's Rift|battlefield]]:
* One beside {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit
* One beside {{uis|Dragon}} pit
* One nearby each buff {{tip|monster}}

''Crystal Spires'' can be captured by {{tip|champions}} after {{tip|minion|minions}} have spawned by standing near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, ''Crystal Spires'' are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

''Crystal Spires'' grant {{g|30 gold}} split among its captors upon being captured, or {{g|15 gold}} if only a single champion participated in its capture, and provide {{tip|sight}} around them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds upon being captured, becoming unable to be recaptured for 15 seconds.

While within range of a ''Crystal Spire'' controlled by his team, or while an enemy is {{tip|stun|stunned}} with {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}} or {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}, '''Skarner''' gains ''Crystal Charge''.

{{sbc|Crystal Charge:}} '''Skarner''' gains {{pp|18|70|72|74|76|78|80|82|85|88|91|94|97|100|104|108|112|116|120|formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{pp|18|key=%|43|48|53|58|63|68|73|80|87|94|101|108|115|124|133|142|151|160|formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level|color=as}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|2% '''maximum''' mana}}}} every second.

q1.name: Crystal Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies in range.
If an enemy is hit, subsequent uses of ''Crystal Slash'' within 4 seconds deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
Basic attacks against non-structures reduce ''Crystal Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
q1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but will not prevent ''Skarner'' from triggering the bonus effect.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|33 to 45}}% AD}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{as|{{ap|33*2 to 45*2}}% AD}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}

w1.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' crystallizes himself, gaining a {{tip|shield}} for up to 6 seconds and initial {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that accelerates by 100% over 3 seconds while the shield holds.

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Shield Strength|{{as|{{ap|10 to 14}}% '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}<!--

r1.name: Impale
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' {{tip|root|roots}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} during the ability's cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon successfully impaling the target, he deals them {{as|60% AD}} {{as|physical damage|physical damage}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}, and {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, during which he can drag his victim with himself. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.
''Impale'' pierces through {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppability}}, dragging them out.{{tt|*|See details for more information.}}
''During the ability '''Skarner''' is locked out from [[basic attack]]ing, casting {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}}, or using {{si|Flash}}.''
r1.notes:
* The ''suppression'' will break if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} ({{ai|R|Bard}}, {{ai|R|Ryze}},{{ai|W|Tahm Kench}}).
* The target will not take ''Impale's'' secondary damage if the ''suppression'' is removed ({{tip|cleanse}}).
* ''Impale'' is canceled (but does not go on cooldown) if '''Skarner''' loses {{tip|sight}} of his target or if they move 800 units away from him (whether by being mid-dash, removing the {{tip|root}} and backing away, or '''Skarner''' being {{tip|airborne|displaced}}) during the cast time.
** {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|root}}.
* ''Impale'' applies {{tt|move block|A move block is a forced movement modifier usually applied by dash and airborne effects.}} on the target if they are not close to '''Skarner''', forcing them to move toward him. This move block is not part of a {{tip|airborne|displacement}} and because of this, {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppability}} cannot ignore the ability's effect. Such cases will be stopped with few exceptions:
** {{cai|Bellows Breath|Ornn}} keep belching fire. The cast direction cannot be changed.
** {{cai|Onslaught of Shadows|Hecarim}} will continue going forward and dealing damage for the full range, however '''Hecarim''' will be taken out and {{tip|fear|fleeing}} everyone around the area where he got impaled.
** Similar to '''Hecarim''', {{cai|Unstoppable Force|Malphite}} stopped early, dealing damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} targets around the area he is impaled.
** {{cai|Assault and Battery|Vi}} cannot be interrupted, and she will continue marching toward the target during the {{tip|suppression}} but will be dragged back. When the effect ends, she will dash to the target as normal.
*** Due the uniqueness of ''Assault and Battery'', '''Vi''' may be able to complete the ability during the {{tip|suppression}} if the target somehow gets close enough to her.
** {{Pending for test}}: If {{ci|Jarvan IV}} is ''Impaled'' during {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, he spawns/does not spawn impassable terrain around his target.
** {{Pending for test}}: If {{ci|Rek'Sai}} is ''Impaled'' during {{ai|Void Rush|Rek'Sai}}, she will/will not {{tip|vanish}} into the ground.
* While ''Impale's'' suppression is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities ({{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}) '''Skarner''' is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
